
OS: NXOS

# December 11th, 2013

# All rights reserved.

CMD: SHOW_VNI
SHOWCMD: show vni
PREFIX: vni-table
ACTUAL:

leaf0# show vni 5000
VNI      Status   BD       VSI
--------------------------------------------

5000     Up      300     VSI-Ethernet2/3.4095
                         VSI-Ethernet2/4.4095
                         VSI-Ethernet2/4.4095

MARKUP:

leaf0# show vni 5000
VNI      Status   BD       VSI
--------------------------------------------

XN<vni>X5000     XW<status>XUp      XN<bd>X300     XI<intf>XVSI-Ethernet2/3.4095
                         XI<alt-intf>XVSI-Ethernet2/4.4095
